humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, there is no metastatic carcinoma found in any of the four sentinel lymph nodes (0/1 for each node). Therefore, based on the rules provided, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states 'Lymph nodes: Sentinel lymph node only. Lymph node status: Negative 0/4.' This means that no cancer was found in the sentinel lymph nodes (4 were examined), so the N stage is N0.
